titleStmt.title: The Popish champion, or, A compleat history of the life and military actions of Richard Earl of Tyrconnel, generalissimo of all the Irish forces now in arms wherein you have a true account of his birth and education, his advancement and honours, his treacherous disarming the Protestants ... : together with a relation of all the skirmishes, battels, sieges, and remarkable transactions which have happened under his government, with the particulars of the late bloody fight in the north ... : as also a brief description of the Kingdom of Ireland ... the means how it came to be a conquer'd kingdom, with the sundry rebellions made by the natives against the Crown of England, and by what means reduced / written for the present satisfaction of all good Protestants ... ; to this treatise is added the life and memorable actions of Father Petre, &c.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The history of the life and actions of Richard Talbot Earl of Tyrconnel.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
